Spotify is rolling out direct messages so you can send songs and chat in-app. Linus and Luke discuss whether anyone actually needs another messaging inbox, or if this just means more spam and clutter.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzvhAMHF_dY

title: Spotify Just Added the Weirdest Feature

Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss Florida and Texas piloting remotely operated, non-/less-lethal armed drones for school shooting response. They cover how the system works (remote ops, 50–100 mph, real-time video), potential payloads (pepper/pepper-ball, taser concerns), “security fog,” and the ethics/risks of deploying disorienting tech around students.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzvhAMHF_dY

title: They're Putting Armed Drones in Schools
